channel.title: Special atack gfx problem look its really wierd!
channel.description: ok, i added gfx to some weapons, but when i atack with it it show the gfx at south how do i fix it? item.title: Special atack gfx problem look its really wierd!

item.description:
@double_helix wrote:

I havent been working with the graphics actually, but I suggest you look at where it is generated. Perhaps you should pass an int that derives your direction.
